title: saptha svarangaL un charaNa
sahitya:
saptha swarangaL un charaNa kamalangaL
sanggetha ulaganaiththum
(saptha)

anupallavi

apramEyaa adhiroopa soundharyaa
suprabhathaththil isainthu magizhnthOdi nee vaa
(saptha)

caraNam

aaraNa porulE aRpudhanE
aaraNa oLivadivE sravaNa jOthiyE
kaaraNam neeyE kaariyamum neeyE
karuNaakaraa iLam kumaraa thiruviNNagaraa
(saptha)
